title: Item sets missing?
body: So now we can't customize our items sets anymore? Its not in the menu.....but the old item set is still there in game. We just cant make new ones.

replies.body: same problem, glad to hear they should be adding it just I'm in  need to make my new item sets since they added new items zzz

Item sets haven't yet been implemented into the new client, but they're coming soon (TM). In the meantime you can still use any item sets you create in the legacy client which you can switch to from the login page of the new client.
